import React, { useState } from "react"; const Contact = ({ data }) => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [subject, setSubject] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); if (data) { var contactName = data.name; var phone = data.phone; var contactEmail = data.email; var contactMessage = data.contactmessage; } const submitForm = () => { window.open( `mailto:${contactEmail}?subject=${encodeURIComponent( subject )}&body=${encodeURIComponent(name)} (${encodeURIComponent( email )}): ${encodeURIComponent(message)}` ); }; return (

); }; export default Contact;
